content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the marijampolė district court the court made a final decision regarding the division of matrimonial property in a divorce case the immovable property an apartment will be divided equally between the applicant and the defendant the defendant will also be awarded shares in a company both parties have obligations towards creditors the applicant is seeking a divorce retention of her married name and monthly maintenance for the children the court ordered the defendant to pay arrears of maintenance and the costs of the proceedings the court also addressed the claims of other creditors and determined certain loans as joint obligations of the spouses the court revoked any previous interim measures for maintenance the matrimonial property will be divided with each party being responsible for paying half the value of the apartment both parties have obligations towards a creditor arising from a credit agreement and the defendant has personal obligations towards another creditor the text also discusses another legal case involving multiple parties and enforcement proceedings the obligations in question relate to enforcement costs and personal obligations of the bailiff there are also obligations towards other creditors related to enforcement cases and promissory notes the defendant is ordered to pay stamp duty and costs related to the service of procedural documents
